name: Ficra
long_description:
Ficra enables product teams to ship higher quality releases, faster. 

Ficra is the source of truth for every product screen and user flow, giving companies real-time visibility into what their users actually see in their live product. Ficra's AI provides a live, visual map of your usersâ€™ journeys: every screen, flow, A/B test, push notification and email. 

With Ficra, product teams no longer waste 25% of their time auditing complex user flows to assess product quality and find the blind spots in funnels.
one_liner: Real time, source of truth for every product screen and user flow
